data.text:
I cannot praise the staff enough for making our stay here so enjoyable! A week just doesnâ€™t feel enough! 

The food is incredible! So much to choose from! 

The staff work so hard! Especially the fun makers! The activities they put on throughout your stay, thereâ€™s something for everyone! Pilates, darts, aerobics in the pool, morning gym! Highly recommend joining in when you can! 

Brilliant array of drinks to choose from, again something for everyone whether you drink alcohol or not. 

Pool is incredibly clean, pool bar well stocked with food for an afternoon lunch and servers rolling around the pool on roller skates is the icing on the cake! 

Thank you all so much for this amazing stay! We hope to be back with you again soon!
data.title: A perfect stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear A8704ZQkellyh,

Thank you so much for your kind words and wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure that every guest has a memorable experience, and we are delighted to hear that you appreciated their efforts. It's great to know that you enjoyed the delicious food options, the wide range of activities, and the cleanliness of our pool. We are especially glad that you found our pool bar and the unique roller-skating servers to be a fun touch!

We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the near future.

Kind regards.
Hotel Management Team
owner_response.author: Galip TOPAL

data.text:
A great hotel. I travelled with my boyfriend during the first week of April. Although the season hadnâ€™t fully started & the shows hadnâ€™t fully begun outside, most of the animation team done an amazing job and made our evenings very enjoyable and entertaining. Special mention to Mali for being so friendly and welcoming. 
There was a lot of construction work going on in and around the hotel as they said itâ€™s â€™pre seasonâ€™ - something which we were not aware about. We still had an amazing time, the staff were very attentive, the facilities that were running were great & the food was delicious. I would definitely come back during the summer season.
data.title: A great holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 29miab,

Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience on Tripadvisor. Thank you for your great comments about our perfect service and our hotel generally. We are glad you have fully enjoyed your stay at the Concorde De Luxe Resort. Your comments regarding our exceptional service and staff are highly appreciated. We will definitely share your positive feedback with our team. Thank you again for your kind words. 

We would be more than happy to welcome you again for another enjoyable holiday in the future. 

Best Regards
Hotel Management Team
owner_response.author: Galip TOPAL

data.title: Amazing hotel for families

data.text: Good service with friendly staff. The grounds were well kept and there was a lot of alcohol. I really liked the beach as well and there were a lot of different activities to engage in all over the resort. I will definitely come back soon to explore again
data.title: Good and friendly service
